_description: A Nativity carol — three 6-line stanzas (ababcc) and burden: ‘Tydynges tydynges that be trwe / Sorowe ys paste and joye dothe renwe’

BLLan379.First Lines:
Qwhereas Adam cawsed be synneOwre nature thus to be
                    mortall…
BLLan379.Last Lines:
…A clen mayde hathe born a kyngAnd þat ys trweFor he
                    ys born to ware the purpull hwe
